lemma order_le_prod [iff]: "order(Product.le r\<^sub>A r\<^sub>B) = (order r\<^sub>A & order r\<^sub>B)"

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. order (Product.le r\<^sub>A r\<^sub>B) =
    (order r\<^sub>A \<and> order r\<^sub>B)

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. order (Product.le r\<^sub>A r\<^sub>B) =
    (order r\<^sub>A \<and> order r\<^sub>B)
apply (unfold order_def)

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. ((\<forall>x. x <=(r\<^sub>A,r\<^sub>B) x) \<and>
     (\<forall>x y.
         x <=(r\<^sub>A,r\<^sub>B) y \<and>
         y <=(r\<^sub>A,r\<^sub>B) x \<longrightarrow>
         x = y) \<and>
     (\<forall>x y z.
         x <=(r\<^sub>A,r\<^sub>B) y \<and>
         y <=(r\<^sub>A,r\<^sub>B) z \<longrightarrow>
         x <=(r\<^sub>A,r\<^sub>B) z)) =
    (((\<forall>x. x \<sqsubseteq>\<^bsub>r\<^sub>A\<^esub> x) \<and>
      (\<forall>x y.
          x \<sqsubseteq>\<^bsub>r\<^sub>A\<^esub> y \<and>
          y \<sqsubseteq>\<^bsub>r\<^sub>A\<^esub> x \<longrightarrow>
          x = y) \<and>
      (\<forall>x y z.
          x \<sqsubseteq>\<^bsub>r\<^sub>A\<^esub> y \<and>
          y \<sqsubseteq>\<^bsub>r\<^sub>A\<^esub> z \<longrightarrow>
          x \<sqsubseteq>\<^bsub>r\<^sub>A\<^esub> z)) \<and>
     (\<forall>x. x \<sqsubseteq>\<^bsub>r\<^sub>B\<^esub> x) \<and>
     (\<forall>x y.
         x \<sqsubseteq>\<^bsub>r\<^sub>B\<^esub> y \<and>
         y \<sqsubseteq>\<^bsub>r\<^sub>B\<^esub> x \<longrightarrow>
         x = y) \<and>
     (\<forall>x y z.
         x \<sqsubseteq>\<^bsub>r\<^sub>B\<^esub> y \<and>
         y \<sqsubseteq>\<^bsub>r\<^sub>B\<^esub> z \<longrightarrow>
         x \<sqsubseteq>\<^bsub>r\<^sub>B\<^esub> z))
apply simp

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. ((\<forall>a. a \<sqsubseteq>\<^bsub>r\<^sub>A\<^esub> a) \<and>
     (\<forall>b. b \<sqsubseteq>\<^bsub>r\<^sub>B\<^esub> b) \<and>
     (\<forall>a b aa ba.
         a \<sqsubseteq>\<^bsub>r\<^sub>A\<^esub> aa \<and>
         b \<sqsubseteq>\<^bsub>r\<^sub>B\<^esub> ba \<and>
         aa \<sqsubseteq>\<^bsub>r\<^sub>A\<^esub> a \<and>
         ba \<sqsubseteq>\<^bsub>r\<^sub>B\<^esub> b \<longrightarrow>
         a = aa \<and> b = ba) \<and>
     (\<forall>a b aa ba ab bb.
         a \<sqsubseteq>\<^bsub>r\<^sub>A\<^esub> aa \<and>
         b \<sqsubseteq>\<^bsub>r\<^sub>B\<^esub> ba \<and>
         aa \<sqsubseteq>\<^bsub>r\<^sub>A\<^esub> ab \<and>
         ba \<sqsubseteq>\<^bsub>r\<^sub>B\<^esub> bb \<longrightarrow>
         a \<sqsubseteq>\<^bsub>r\<^sub>A\<^esub> ab \<and>
         b \<sqsubseteq>\<^bsub>r\<^sub>B\<^esub> bb)) =
    ((\<forall>x. x \<sqsubseteq>\<^bsub>r\<^sub>A\<^esub> x) \<and>
     (\<forall>x y.
         x \<sqsubseteq>\<^bsub>r\<^sub>A\<^esub> y \<and>
         y \<sqsubseteq>\<^bsub>r\<^sub>A\<^esub> x \<longrightarrow>
         x = y) \<and>
     (\<forall>x y z.
         x \<sqsubseteq>\<^bsub>r\<^sub>A\<^esub> y \<and>
         y \<sqsubseteq>\<^bsub>r\<^sub>A\<^esub> z \<longrightarrow>

     (\<forall>x. x \<sqsubseteq>\<^bsub>r\<^sub>B\<^esub> x) \<and>

         x = y) \<and>
     (\<forall>x y z.
         x \<sqsubseteq>\<^bsub>r\<^sub>B\<^esub> y \<and>
         y \<sqsubseteq>\<^bsub>r\<^sub>B\<^esub> z \<longrightarrow>
         x \<sqsubseteq>\<^bsub>r\<^sub>B\<^esub> z))

apply blast+

lemma closed_lift2_sup:
  "\<lbrakk> closed (err A) (lift2 f); closed (err B) (lift2 g) \<rbrakk> \<Longrightarrow> 
  closed (err(A\<times>B)) (lift2(sup f g))"

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. \<lbrakk>closed (err A) (lift2 f); closed (err B) (lift2 g)\<rbrakk>
    \<Longrightarrow> closed (err (A \<times> B)) (lift2 (Product.sup f g))

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. \<lbrakk>closed (err A) (lift2 f); closed (err B) (lift2 g)\<rbrakk>
    \<Longrightarrow> closed (err (A \<times> B)) (lift2 (Product.sup f g))
apply (unfold closed_def plussub_def lift2_def err_def' sup_def)

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. \<lbrakk>\<forall>x\<in>insert Err {x. \<exists>y\<in>A. x = OK y}.
                \<forall>y\<in>insert Err {x. \<exists>y\<in>A. x = OK y}.
                   (case x of Err \<Rightarrow> Err
                    | OK x \<Rightarrow>
                        case y of Err \<Rightarrow> Err
                        | OK xa \<Rightarrow> f x xa)
                   \<in> insert Err {x. \<exists>y\<in>A. x = OK y};
     \<forall>x\<in>insert Err {x. \<exists>y\<in>B. x = OK y}.
        \<forall>y\<in>insert Err {x. \<exists>y\<in>B. x = OK y}.
           (case x of Err \<Rightarrow> Err
            | OK x \<Rightarrow>
                case y of Err \<Rightarrow> Err
                | OK xa \<Rightarrow> g x xa)
           \<in> insert Err {x. \<exists>y\<in>B. x = OK y}\<rbrakk>
    \<Longrightarrow> \<forall>x\<in>insert Err
{x. \<exists>y\<in>A \<times> B. x = OK y}.
                         \<forall>y\<in>insert Err
   {x. \<exists>y\<in>A \<times> B. x = OK y}.
                            (case x of Err \<Rightarrow> Err
                             | OK x \<Rightarrow>
                                 case y of Err \<Rightarrow> Err
                                 | OK xa \<Rightarrow>
                                     (case x of
(a\<^sub>1, b\<^sub>1) \<Rightarrow>
  \<lambda>(a\<^sub>2, b\<^sub>2).
     Err.sup Pair (f a\<^sub>1 a\<^sub>2) (g b\<^sub>1 b\<^sub>2))
xa)
                            \<in> insert Err
                                   {x. \<exists>y\<in>A \<times> B.
    x = OK y}
apply (simp split: err.split)

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. \<lbrakk>\<forall>y\<in>A.
                \<forall>ya\<in>A.
                   f y ya = Err \<or> (\<exists>yb\<in>A. f y ya = OK yb);
     \<forall>y\<in>B.
        \<forall>ya\<in>B.
           g y ya = Err \<or> (\<exists>yb\<in>B. g y ya = OK yb)\<rbrakk>
    \<Longrightarrow> \<forall>a b.
                         a \<in> A \<and> b \<in> B \<longrightarrow>
                         (\<forall>aa ba.
                             aa \<in> A \<and> ba \<in> B \<longrightarrow>
                             f a aa = Err \<or>
                             g b ba = Err \<or>
                             (\<exists>x\<in>A. f a aa = OK x) \<and>
                             (\<exists>y\<in>B. g b ba = OK y))
apply blast

No subgoals!

 1. \<And>a aa b ab ac ba.
       \<lbrakk>semilat (err a, Err.le aa, lift2 b);
        semilat (err ab, Err.le ac, lift2 ba)\<rbrakk>
       \<Longrightarrow> order (Err.le (Product.le aa ac)) \<and>
                         closed (err (a \<times> ab))
                          (lift2 (Product.sup b ba)) \<and>
                         (\<forall>x\<in>err (a \<times> ab).
                             \<forall>y\<in>err (a \<times> ab).
                                x \<sqsubseteq>\<^bsub>Err.le
                  (Product.le aa
                    ac)\<^esub> x \<squnion>\<^bsub>lift2
               (Product.sup b ba)\<^esub> y) \<and>
                         (\<forall>x\<in>err (a \<times> ab).
                             \<forall>y\<in>err (a \<times> ab).
                                y \<sqsubseteq>\<^bsub>Err.le
                  (Product.le aa
                    ac)\<^esub> x \<squnion>\<^bsub>lift2
               (Product.sup b ba)\<^esub> y) \<and>
                         (\<forall>x\<in>err (a \<times> ab).
                             \<forall>y\<in>err (a \<times> ab).
                                \<forall>z\<in>err (a \<times> ab).
                                   x \<sqsubseteq>\<^bsub>Err.le
                     (Product.le aa ac)\<^esub> z \<and>
                                   y \<sqsubseteq>\<^bsub>Err.le
                     (Product.le aa ac)\<^esub> z \<longrightarrow>
                                   x \<squnion>\<^bsub>lift2
                  (Product.sup b ba)\<^esub> y 
                                   \<sqsubseteq>\<^bsub>Err.le
                   (Product.le aa ac)\<^esub> z)
apply (simp (no_asm_simp) only: Semilat.closedI [OF Semilat.intro] closed_lift2_sup)

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. \<And>a aa b aaa aaaa ba.
       \<lbrakk>semilat (err a, Err.le aa, lift2 b);
        semilat (err aaa, Err.le aaaa, lift2 ba)\<rbrakk>
       \<Longrightarrow> order (Err.le (Product.le aa aaaa)) \<and>
                         True \<and>
                         (\<forall>x\<in>err (a \<times> aaa).
                             \<forall>y\<in>err (a \<times> aaa).
                                case lift2
(\<lambda>(a\<^sub>1, b\<^sub>1) (a\<^sub>2, b\<^sub>2).
    Err.sup Pair (a\<^sub>1 \<squnion>\<^bsub>b\<^esub> a\<^sub>2)
     (b\<^sub>1 \<squnion>\<^bsub>ba\<^esub> b\<^sub>2))
x y of
                                Err \<Rightarrow> True
                                | OK y \<Rightarrow>
                                    case x of Err \<Rightarrow> False
                                    | OK x \<Rightarrow>
  x <=(aa,aaaa) y) \<and>
                         (\<forall>x\<in>err (a \<times> aaa).
                             \<forall>y\<in>err (a \<times> aaa).
                                case lift2
(\<lambda>(a\<^sub>1, b\<^sub>1) (a\<^sub>2, b\<^sub>2).
    Err.sup Pair (a\<^sub>1 \<squnion>\<^bsub>b\<^esub> a\<^sub>2)
     (b\<^sub>1 \<squnion>\<^bsub>ba\<^esub> b\<^sub>2))
x y of
                                Err \<Rightarrow> True
                                | OK ya \<Rightarrow>
                                    case y of Err \<Rightarrow> False
                                    | OK x \<Rightarrow>
  x <=(aa,aaaa) ya) \<and>
                         (\<forall>x\<in>err (a \<times> aaa).
                             \<forall>y\<in>err (a \<times> aaa).
                                \<forall>z\<in>err (a \<times> aaa).
                                   (case z of Err \<Rightarrow> True
                                    | OK y \<Rightarrow>
  case x of Err \<Rightarrow> False
  | OK x \<Rightarrow> x <=(aa,aaaa) y) \<and>
                                   (case z of Err \<Rightarrow> True
                                    | OK ya \<Rightarrow>
  case y of Err \<Rightarrow> False
  | OK x \<Rightarrow> x <=(aa,aaaa) ya) \<longrightarrow>
                                   (case z of Err \<Rightarrow> True
                                    | OK ya \<Rightarrow>
  case lift2
        (\<lambda>(a\<^sub>1, b\<^sub>1) (a\<^sub>2, b\<^sub>2).
            Err.sup Pair (a\<^sub>1 \<squnion>\<^bsub>b\<^esub> a\<^sub>2)
             (b\<^sub>1 \<squnion>\<^bsub>ba\<^esub> b\<^sub>2))
        x y of
  Err \<Rightarrow> False | OK x \<Rightarrow> x <=(aa,aaaa) ya))
